data.title: Luigi Pirandello
data.meta_description: Sold for $164 | Italian author and dramatist (1867–1936) best known for the modern stage classic Six Characters in Search of an Author. Partial TLS in
data.text:
Description

Winner of the 1934 Nobel Prize in Literature

Italian author and dramatist (1867–1936) best known for the modern stage classic Six Characters in Search of an Author. Partial TLS in Italian, one page, 8.5 x 10.5, no date. The last four lines of a typed three-page letter in which Pirandello mentions Prof. Montague. In very good condition, with letter lightly affixed to a larger sheet, trimmed top edge, and wrinkles. The signature is clear and generally unaffected. R&R COA.
